headline: PTC, Agilysys, Elastic, and Guidewire Software Shares Are Falling, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the afternoon session after a significant downward revision in U.S. job creation data fueled concerns about a weakening labor market.

headline: Nucleus Research Releases 2025 Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) Data Platform Technology Value Matrix
summary: The Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) Data Platform market is moving beyond basic device connectivity to deliver measurable value through advanced data integration, AI, and edge intelligence. Organizations are investing in platforms that unify operational, enterprise, and engineering data into centralized repositories, enabling real-time insights that improve asset performance, reduce downtime, and optimize resource use. This shift reflects a clear focus on ROI, with IIoT platforms increasing

headline: PTC (PTC): Evaluating Whether Steady Growth Signals More Upside or a Fully Priced Stock
summary: PTC (PTC) has been catching some eyes lately, even without a single headline-making event to drive the chatter. Sometimes, it is these quiet stretches that actually make for the most interesting moments, especially for investors wondering whether the current calm is a breather before the next leg up or just the status quo settling in. With the stock market always searching for growth stories, these small moves can prompt investors to take a closer look. Over the past year, PTC’s shares have...
